DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical technical success well safety feasibility E-liac Stent Graft System use endovascular treatment uni- bilateral aortoiliac iliac aneurysm . Main study target exclusion aneurysm primary patency arteria iliaca interna arteria iliaca externa iliac implantation side .
DOC.brief_title: Post-market Registry Patients With Iliac Aneurysm Undergoing Endovascular Stenting With E-liac Stent Graft System
DOC.criteria: Patients must comply indication use Unilateral bilateral common iliac aneurysm diameter equal great 25mm Unsuitable distal seal site within common iliac artery traditional EVAR Patients stenotic internal iliac ostium < 4mm diameter Patients severe internal iliac atherosclerosis Patients suitable land area main stem IIA Patients pseudoaneurysms Patients symptomatic rupture iliac aneurysm Patients one contraindication indicate instruction use Patients pretreated bifurcate vascular graft Patient thrombocytopenia Patient creatinine > 2.4 mg/dl immediately intervention Patient malignancy need chemotherapy radiation Patients enrol another clinical study Patients life expectancy le 36 month
